ResearchProjectDef.label: autonomous missile logistics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Develop the technology to manufacture cruise missiles and build the infrastructure for global autonomous delivery. Unlocks the ARSENAL manufacturing facility, HUB staging platforms, and HOP refueling stations.

ResearchProjectDef.label: autonomous drone swarm defense
ResearchProjectDef.description: Develop autonomous drone swarm technology for base defense. The LATTICE C2 system coordinates DART drones launched from QUIVER hubs to automatically intercept and eliminate hostile threats. Requires ARGUS sensors for threat detection. Unlike cruise missiles, these drones operate locally and can return home if threats are neutralized.

ResearchProjectDef.label: SKYLINK orbital systems
ResearchProjectDef.description:
Develop orbital satellite technology for global MITHRIL network operations. The SKYLINK system provides a communications backbone in orbit, enabling HERALD relays and HAWKEYE systems to operate from anywhere on the planet.

Unlocks:
- SKYLINK Launch Pad (satellite manufacturing)
- SKYLINK Terminal (connects LATTICE to satellite)

ResearchProjectDef.label: HERALD relay network
ResearchProjectDef.description: Develop surface-based relay stations that connect to the SKYLINK satellite network. HERALD relays allow remote tiles to maintain network connectivity with the central LATTICE system. Essential for coordinated operations across multiple map tiles.\n\nRequires operational SKYLINK satellite.

ResearchProjectDef.label: HAWKEYE tactical suite
ResearchProjectDef.description:
Develop wearable command systems that integrate with the MITHRIL network via SKYLINK. The HAWKEYE helmet turns its wearer into a mobile sensor node with the ability to designate DAGGER strikes and mark priority targets for DART convergence.

Unlocks:
- HAWKEYE Helmet (craftable at fabrication bench)

Requires operational SKYLINK satellite.

ResearchProjectDef.label: MULE utility drone network
ResearchProjectDef.description:
Develop ground-based utility drones for autonomous mining and hauling operations. The MULE (Mobile Utility Logistics Engine) system integrates with LATTICE to automate resource extraction and delivery.

Unlocks:
- STABLE (drone bay for MULE storage and charging)
- MORIA (automated storage vault)
- MULE drone manufacturing at ARSENAL

MULEs automatically mine designated ore and haul resources to MORIA storage vaults.
